sections.content:
Ever been on Youtube, Wikipedia or Github ? You browse something interesting start read about it then you read some more. Then you find a link and reads more and more. WHOA! Where did the time go ?
That's what we where aiming for when we creatd Devvelopers Hangout. A Place to explore other peoples Projects see what they have made, and maybe make a connection and help out?

Maybe your looking for other developers to help you out with a project or similar?

As a developer, showing off your skills can help you in many ways.

  • Improve your basic skills
  • Land a job
  • Get feedback for a project
  • Further, develop a project
  • Get new friends just by showing off what you know

The possibilities are endless really of why you want to show what skills you know
In developers hangout let your skills shine on the profile, so people know EXACTLY what you are good at.

Are you a lonesome developer? Sitting at work or maybe in your own room typing away the code?
Do you wish that you could meet fellow developers instead of hundreds of Facebook groups and LinkedIn Groups?
Well Developers Hangout have ya covered, its a community made by a developer for other developers!
Register today to get to know other developres and connect!
